channel.title: Welcome! on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Savo's Site

item.title: Head of Electronics
item.description: Oversee the development and production of novel electrical systems to aid in the operation of our boundary pushing vehicles

item.title: Targeted Hyperthermia for Glioblastoma Using Multiple Magnetic Tweezer System
item.description: NOTE: Currently under preparation. In this publication my primary contributions were the simulations of the distributed alternating magnetic field using COMSOL Multiphysics resulting from a coil bed I designed iteratively to improve the control and strength of the magnetic field for therapy.

item.title: This Website
item.description: I made this website from scratch, would you like to peer behind the curtain?

item.title: Hardware Clock
item.description: A modular clock composed entirely out of discrete logic chips I got secondhand.

item.title: Research Assistant
item.description: Contributed electro-magneto-thermal simulations and hardware design for novel hyperthermia therapy for globioblastoma.

item.title: Bus Stop Checker
item.description: Made a small system to check online for buses around my home at the press of a button.

item.title: Reliability Engineering Coop
item.description: Worked to oversee and implement new preventative and predictive maintenance programs, as well as providing other support to the engineering team

item.title: gameBOI
item.description: A small handheld capable of offering several user selectable games to be played using the two buttons and 32 LEDs that form a display. Created in under two weeks!

item.title: F!rosh Games Co-Chair
item.description: Organized and delivered a sporting event to over 1000 participants across 20 teams, coordinating with over 20 parties internal and external to the Orientation committee

item.title: Zephyr
item.description: Designed the electronics system for Zephy, HPVDT’s entry to ASME 2019

item.title: Oscilloscope
item.description: Produced an Arduino-based USB oscilloscope capable of measuring signals up to 20kHz, with AC/DC coupling and hardware 1X/10X scaling

item.title: Mountain Bike Suspension
item.description: Developed a kinematic model in MATLAB to perform a design optimization of a mountain bike suspension system.

item.title: Force Feedback Tester
item.description: Expanded on my basic, single-axis, force feedback system to now monitor and control up to six axes and eased user configuration

item.title: F!rosh P!rank Co-Chair
item.description: Organized an hour of entertainment for around 1000 attendees across 10 rooms with unique schedules for each one

item.title: Advance Co-op
item.description: Focused on developing novel quality assurance testing schemes for an automotive component supplier.

item.title: Entry Fob Replication
item.description: Reverse engineered and replicated an access fob for my residence at the time

item.title: Kneeload Tester
item.description: Implemented a system to allow a legacy (pre-2000) welding robot to recieve force feedback from a modern computer.

item.title: Technical Centre Associate
item.description: Was introduced to, and developed automated durability testing for automotive parts.
